RTUCards.migration.fromV1.message.title: RTUC - Migrating to V1.10...
RTUCards.migration.fromV1.message.succes: Your registered decks data have been successfully migrated from previous version
RTUCards.migration.fromV1.message.hint: Normally, your players won't see much changes. But you have now more options on what can be allowed to your players. Please check the readme file for more details.
RTUCards.migration.fromV1.message.noWorr: You can still go back to previous version.
RTUCards.migration.fromV1.message.fallba: No configuration has been deleted. If the new configuration GUI and options displease you, you can downgrade to V1.9.
RTUCards.migration.fromV1.message.custom: Some of your decks were build via hooks.

Since hook signature has been modified, their action configuration panel avec been unlocked. (To ensure your don't loose your current decks configurations). When you're sure the other modules have ugraded their hooks, please lock back their configuration panels. It will then again map their actions to the ones defined in hooks
RTUCards.settings.config-actions.title: Setup which decks you want!
RTUCards.settings.config-actions.hint: Once set, cards stacks will be automatically created
RTUCards.settings.config-actions.additio: This deck uses a custom implementation for card display. Some of the following actions may have been directly removed inside the implementation and won't be managed here.
If unlocked, you can define which actions should be available. Do it only if you're sure that this stack declaration won't evolve anymore. Lock it again to restore default values.
If checked, revealed cards will be put face down
RTUCards.settings.config-shortcuts.title: Configure your shortcuts
RTUCards.settings.config-shortcuts.hint: Choose where to display shortcuts of your hand and revealed cards
RTUCards.settings.gmName.label: GM name
RTUCards.settings.gmName.hint: Name displayed when GMs perfom actions on decks
RTUCards.settings.gmIcon.label: GM icon
RTUCards.settings.gmIcon.hint: Displayed when GMs perform actions on decks
RTUCards.settings.smallDisplay.label: Smaller window
RTUCards.settings.smallDisplay.hint: The classic card stack sheet may take too much room if you use a laptop screen
RTUCards.settings.stackForPlayerHand.hin: Each player has card in hands. These cards are hidden from other players.
RTUCards.settings.stackForPlayerRevealed: Each player has some visible cards displayed in front on him
RTUCards.settings.sheet.headers.fromDeck: Available actions on deck display: (Needs OWNER permissions)
RTUCards.settings.sheet.headers.fromHand: Available actions on user hand display:
RTUCards.settings.sheet.headers.fromReve: Available actions when handling revealed cards:
RTUCards.settings.sheet.headers.fromDisc: Available actions on discard pile display: (Needs OWNER permissions)
RTUCards.card.sheet.name: RTUCards sheet
RTUCards.action.peekOnCards.label: Peeks on cards
RTUCards.action.peekOnCards.desc: By default, deck and hand cards are not visible, only back is displayed. This is also the case for other player hands. Those options allow GM to peek on those cards. (A message will let everyone know he is doing it).
RTUCards.action.peekOnCards.peek.label: Toggle visibility
RTUCards.action.dealCard.label: Deal cards
RTUCards.action.dealCard.desc: GM can give cards to users when manipulating the deck. Action is available via the deck stack, on left side.
RTUCards.action.dealCard.deal.label: Deal cards
RTUCards.action.drawDeckCard.label: Draw the top card
RTUCards.action.drawDeckCard.desc: Users can draw cards themself. Action is available via the user stacks, on left side
RTUCards.action.drawDeckCard.draw.label: Draw a card
RTUCards.action.shuffleDeck.label: Shuffle the deck
RTUCards.action.shuffleDeck.desc: GM can shuffle the remaining cards of the deck. Action is available via the deck stack, on left side
RTUCards.action.resetDeck.label: Reset the deck
RTUCards.action.resetDeck.desc: GM can choose to take back all cards and shuffle them. Action is available via the deck stack, on left side
RTUCards.action.resetDeck.reset.label: Reset
RTUCards.action.drawDiscardCard.label: Draw the top card
RTUCards.action.drawDiscardCard.desc: Users can draw the top cards from the discard. Action is available via the user stacks, on left side
RTUCards.action.shuffleDiscard.label: Shuffle the discard
RTUCards.action.shuffleDiscard.desc: GM can shuffle the discard, changing the cards order. Action is available via the discard stack, on left side
RTUCards.action.resetDiscard.label: Reset the discard
RTUCards.action.resetDiscard.desc: GM can choose to take put all cards from the discard back to the deck. If deck shuffle is allowed, the deck will be shuffled.
RTUCards.action.resetDiscard.reset.label: Reset
RTUCards.action.playCard.label: Play a card (card effect is applied)
RTUCards.action.playCard.desc: A user can play one of his cards by paying the appropriate cost. Displayed message will indicate the card effects.
RTUCards.action.playCard.play.label: Play the card
RTUCards.action.moveCard.label: Move a card through stacks
RTUCards.action.moveCard.desc: A user can transfer one of his cards to another user stack.
RTUCards.action.moveCard.backDeck.label: Back to deck
RTUCards.action.moveCard.give.label: Give card
RTUCards.action.exchangeCard.label: Exchange a card with a not owner stack
RTUCards.action.exchangeCard.desc: A user can transfer one of his cards to another user stack or with the discard.
RTUCards.action.transferCards.label: [Between a user's two stacks] Transfer cards
RTUCards.action.transferCards.desc: A user can transfer a card between its two stacks.
RTUCards.action.swapCards.label: [Between a user's two stacks] Swap cards
RTUCards.action.swapCards.desc: A user can swap cards between its two stacks.
RTUCards.action.swapCards.withHand.label: Swap with hand
RTUCards.action.flipCard.label: Loop through card faces
RTUCards.action.flipCard.desc: When manipulating his cards, a user can flip them.
RTUCards.action.flipCard.flip.label: Flip the card
RTUCards.action.rotateCard.label: Rotate the card
RTUCards.action.rotateCard.desc: Sometimes, it's easier to see things on card where seeing it upside down. Just some IHM option, no impact on the card state.
RTUCards.action.rotateCard.rotate.label: Rotate the card
RTUCards.user.hand.title: Cards in hand (USER)
RTUCards.user.hand.description: Only the owner player may see this hand.
RTUCards.user.pile.title: Revealed cards (USER)
RTUCards.user.pile.description: Visible to everyone. But only the owner player may perform actions on it.
RTUCards.gm.hand.title: Cards in hand (Gamemaster)
RTUCards.gm.hand.description: Only the GMs may see this hand.
RTUCards.gm.pile.title: Revealed cards (Gamemaster)
RTUCards.gm.pile.description: Visible to everyone. But only the GMs may perform actions on it.

RTUCards.default.sheet.actions.backToDec: Put it back in the deck

RTUCards.default.sheet.actions.swapWithH: Swap revealed card with one in hand

RTUCards.default.message.backToDeck.pile: The card has been put back to the deck
'CORE': Discard has been shuffled back into the deck
